## FileContainer.writeJson() method

Write file contents as a JSON object.

Signature:

```typescript
writeJson(key: string, content: string): void;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description |
| --------- | ------ | ----------- |
| key       | string |             |
| content   | string |             |

Returns:

void

## Example

```js
fsInstance.writeJson("some/file.json", { json: "file contents" });
```
